name: Spectralaxy (Android)
description:
Spectralaxy

A particle based Android game (in development) where you can control the particles with various phone inputs. choose from different colours,  forces and other options.  This game is not tested on anything other than a  Samsung  Galaxy S6,  S9+ and Pixel 2 XL...yet. Would love to hear some feedback. 

Controls:

4 touch inputs and tilt.

Options button - top middle.

Known issues:

1. Some of the toggles in the options are not very responsive.

2. Turning particle fx on and off resets them.

3. Stop 'options' button from activating when sliding finger over.

On the horizon:

Option to choose between controlling the game with tilt or by dragging.

More user control over the particles.

Lots of other nice things :-)
